entry.title: RT tonyolendo.eth: When I see paid testnets, what you're saying is you don't care about the global South. No one in the decision room knows what it me...
entry.summary:
RT tonyolendo.eth When I see paid testnets, what you're saying is you don't care about the global South. No one in the decision room knows what it means to not have a credit card, to pay a week's wages on gas fees, to have your access to USD limited due to forex controls and Western blacklisting
Patrick Collins 🌪: I think this summaries my stance on paid testnets.
